unnormalised: Hey, I was just reading about the latest advancements in oncology, specifically for breast cancer. My aunt was diagnosed last year, stage 2. Dr. Reddy suggested a new treatment protocol involving some kind of targeted therapy, but it's costing around Rs. 15 lakhs. We're also considering a second opinion from AIIMS Delhi; someone mentioned Dr. Sharma there is really good. Anyone else have experience with similar treatments or doctors in the field? Thinking of starting a fundraiser to help with the costs...
normalised: Hey, I was just reading about the latest advancements in oncology, specifically for breast cancer. My aunt was diagnosed last year, stage two. Doctor Reddy suggested a new treatment protocol involving some kind of targeted therapy, but it is costing around rupee one point five million. We are also considering a second opinion from A-I-I-M-S Delhi; someone mentioned Doctor Sharma there is really good. Anyone else have experience with similar treatments or doctors in the field? Thinking of starting a fundraiser to help with the costs...
